pages.text: I have discovered that redstone focuses the energy of the red anomalies, I will call this energy $(red_magic). Now that I have samples of $(red_magic) in the form of $(red_resource_basic) I can begin investigating its uses. It seems to have an affinity for defense, so I've designed a simple ward that should increase the protection of any piece of armour.
I simply need to combine the armour with a little $(red_resource_all).
